page.title: 14INFANT SCHOOL -FINDING OUT 2
page.content: Many people had only lived in the area a short time, though many had lived here for at least 5 years. We asked what people liked to do in their spare time and the most popular activety was reading. Second was playing sports and third was gardening. We also asked what they liked most about the area. They replied that they thought it was a quiet and peaceful place. They liked all the open spaces and they thought that all the people were very friendly. We wanted to know where people did their shopping, and we discovered that most people went to a supermarket for a lot of their food, but they still went to other shops regularly. Bakers and greengrocers were the most popular.
